English:
Hang on! What is it with you guys?
Do you want something from me?
Chinese:
等、等一下……你們想幹嘛？
找我有什麼事嗎！？
Korean:
자, 잠깐… 뭐야, 너희들…
나한테, 볼일이라도 있어!?
German:
Moment! Was habt ihr Kerle vor?
Wollt ihr was von mir?

English: Hehehe. You got a nice one, don't ya?
Chinese: 嘿嘿……妳身上的東西不錯嘛！
Korean: 헤헤에… 꽤 좋은 거, 갖고 있잖아
German: Hehehe. Du hast ’nen besonders Schönen, was?

English: What? What do you mean, a nice one?

Hey, you're gonna make us come out and say it?
We're Zaxon hackers.
Chinese:
喂喂喂喂！妳是故意想讓我們說出口嗎？
我們可是……Zaxon的駭客喔！
Korean:
야야야야, 굳이 그걸 입 밖으로 내게 만들 셈이야?
우리들… 그 잭슨의 해커 님이라고?
German:
He, brauchst du es vielleicht schriftlich?
Wir sind Zaxon-Hacker.

English:
You can figure out that much by yourself, right?
You're not a kid, after all.
Chinese:
這點小事……妳自己想想就會明白吧？
又不是……小孩子，對吧？
Korean:
그 정도는… 스스로 생각해 보면 알잖아?
어린애가… 아니니까, 응?
German:
So viel hast du doch kapiert, oder?
Du bist schließlich kein kleines Kind.

English:
You're kidding me! Whoa, h-hey, hang on!
Could you not stare at me like that? It's giving
me the creeps!
Chinese:
騙人……等等等等等等一下！
不要用變態的眼神盯著我不放！！
Korean:
거짓말… 자자자, 자, 잠깐!?
그런 엉큼한 눈으로, 빤히 보지 말아 주실래요!?
German:
Das meint ihr nicht ernst! He, Moment, stopp!
Könntet ihr mich bitte nicht so anglotzen?
Ihr macht mir Angst!

English:
Wait, this... This isn't what flirting is supposed
to be, is it? Ick! No way! Ew, ew, ew!
Chinese:
該不會就是……傳說中的……搭訕？
不會吧……討厭啦！真的假的！？　糟糕……騙人的吧！？
Korean:
그보다, 이거… 그 전설의… HUN-TING!?
거짓말… 어머, 진짜!? …진짜, 말도 안 돼… 거짓말~!?
German:
Moment ... Ihr versucht doch nicht etwa, mit mir
zu flirten, oder? Igitt! Nein! Pfui!

English: Wait, what are you talking about?
Chinese: 呃……妳不要自得其樂好嗎！？
Korean: 잠깐… 너, 뭘 혼자서 들뜨고 그래!?
German: Wie jetzt, von was redest du denn hier?

English:
Gaaaaaaaah!
Hang on. [p]?
Where were you?! You're late!
Chinese:
啊～～～！？　拜……拜託！[p]！？
好慢！你又這麼慢才來！！
Korean:
아앗―――!? 자, 잠깐 [p]!?
늦어! 또 늦었어―――!!
German:
Aaaaaargh!
Moment. [p]?
Wo hast du denn gesteckt?! Du bist spät dran!

English:
And because you were late, look at this situation
I'm in!
Chinese: 都是你遲到害的啦……你看看現在這個狀態！
Korean: 네가 늦은 탓에… 봐봐, 이 사태!
German:
Und schau dir an, in was für einer Klemme ich
deshalb stecke!

English:
They've got me dead-to-rights here!
Who knows what they'll do to me?
Chinese:
我好像被鎖☆定了耶！？
而且還差點被迫這樣那樣！？
Korean:
왠지, 록♡온 당해 버렸는데요!?
게다가, 이런 짓이나 저런 짓을 당할 것 같은데요!?
German:
Die haben mich hier voll erwischt!
Wer weiß, was sie jetzt mit mir machen?

English:
What the heck are you talking about?
And who the heck are you? A friend of hers?
Chinese:
什麼？妳……妳少胡說八道！
再說……你是誰啊？是她的同伴嗎？
Korean:
하아!? 여, 영문 모를 소리 지껄이지 마!
…그보다 너 누구야!? 이 여자의 동료냐!?
German:
Was zum Teufel faselst du da?
Und wer zum Teufel bist du?
Seid ihr Freunde?

English:
Oh-ho! You want to get into it?
All righty, then.
I'll rip the two of you apart, real simple!
Chinese:
喔……想打嗎？
那……那我就不客氣啦！
Korean:
어이쿠… 한 판 붙자는 거냐?
그럼… 사양 않고, 둘 다 사이좋게 가져가 준다?
German:
Oho! Ihr wollt euch mit uns anlegen?
Na dann los.
Euch zwei nehm ich sofort auseinander!

Chinese: 嘿嘿……！　搶走你們的帳號！！
